## function_createCSSTransition
> **createCSSTransition**(`start`): [`TransitionFn`](../../services/transitions/baseTransitions#transitionfn)

Defined in: [core/src/services/transitions/cssTransitions.ts:41](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/services/transitions/cssTransitions.ts#L41)

Create a simple css transition.

### Parameters

#### start

[`CSSTransitionFn`](#csstransitionfn)

a function that creates the css animation and returns a clean-up function

### Returns

[`TransitionFn`](../../services/transitions/baseTransitions#transitionfn)

the css transition

## type alias_CSSTransitionFn
> **CSSTransitionFn**: (`element`, `direction`, `animated`, `context`) => `void` \| () => `void`

Defined in: [core/src/services/transitions/cssTransitions.ts:32](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/services/transitions/cssTransitions.ts#L32)

Defines a function type for CSS transitions.

### Parameters

#### element

[`SSRHTMLElement`](../../types#ssrhtmlelement)

#### direction

`"show"` | `"hide"`

#### animated

`boolean`

#### context

`object`

### Returns

`void` \| () => `void`

## function_getTransitionDurationMs
> **getTransitionDurationMs**(`element`): `number`

Defined in: [core/src/services/transitions/cssTransitions.ts:21](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/services/transitions/cssTransitions.ts#L21)

Retrieve the transition duration of the provided html element in milli seconds

### Parameters

#### element

[`HTMLElement`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/HTMLElement)

the html element

### Returns

`number`

transition duration in milli seconds

## function_hasTransition
> **hasTransition**(`element`): `boolean`

Defined in: [core/src/services/transitions/cssTransitions.ts:12](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/services/transitions/cssTransitions.ts#L12)

Check if the provided html element has a transition

### Parameters

#### element

[`HTMLElement`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/HTMLElement)

the html element

### Returns

`boolean`

true if the element has a transition
